text: As a quick update, this is not currently possible to do (pulling in featured images from an external RSS feed in the RSS Listing module or tag).

<@U017R8HRE06> another way to use this method with the latter is to have your 'default' content in the rich text modules which the majority and anyone that is not on a list will see, then you can set smart rules for the lists that you do have and swap the content out on those modules with rules setup. Hope that makes sense.
